title: Display property 'none' not taking effect in new PDF emitter
description: In the new PDF emitter, when the display property of an item is set to 'none', it is not being applied as expected.
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, the item is still visible in the output PDF.
EB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, the item should be hidden in the output PDF.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the PDF emitter.
2. Set the display property of an item to 'none'.
3. Generate the PDF output.
4. Verify that the item is still visible in the PDF.
